ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates how the RolloverModifier can be applied to a real-time chart, giving cursor-style feedback as the chart is rendered.
ExampleDefinition.Description:
This example demonstrates the use of the [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#RolloverModifier.html']RolloverModifier[/url] in a real-time context. The RolloverModifier provides a DataContext which you can bind to if you want to display X,Y values under the cursor.
Notice in the source code for this example, we set [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.ChartModifiers.InspectSeriesModifierBase~UseInterpolation.html']RolloverModifier.UseInterpolation[/url] = true, and create a separate ItemsControl to bind to RolloverModifier.SeriesData.SeriesInfo. This is a collection of objects which exposes X,Y values, series names and series color at the cursor position.
The ItemsControl is very similar to the internals of the LegendControl. Both RolloverModifier and LegendModifier expose a collection of SeriesInfo objects, which contain data about the X,Y values, series name and series color.
